dayOfWeek.description: The weekday (1 - Monday, 2 - Tuesday, 3 - Wednesday, 4 - Thursday, 5 - Friday, 6 - Saturday, 7 - Sunday)

intervals.description: A list of openinghours (time intervals), only required when `closed` is `false`

date.description: The date of a special opening hour (format: yyyy-MM-dd)

id.description: The uberall unique id for the photo

description.description: A description for the photo - max 255 chars

id.description: The uberall unique id of the data point

liked.description: Whether this datapoint has been liked or not

data.description: Content of the datapoint (text of the review, url of the photo, count of checkins...)

type.description: Datapoint Type. Values: [PHOTO, REVIEW, CHECKIN, CONVERSATION, QUESTION]

countLikes.description: Number of likes to this item

actionDate.description: The date when the review/photo/... was published in the online directory

countComments.description: Number of comments to this item.

dateCreated.description: The date the datapoint was found

directLink.description: A link to the online profile

flagged.description: Whether the datapoint has been flagged. The exact nature of the flagging depends on the directory, but can be e.g. "Report as SPAM"

rating.description: Rating given by the user. Float value, max: 5.

repliedByOwner.description: True if the owner of the business has replied

secondaryData.description: Additional info about the datapoint (eg. text content on instagram pictures)

threadActionDate.description: The date of the last interaction in that thread. When a review receives a new comment, the parent will update.

title.description: The title of the Social Post. For type QUESTION_AND_ANSWER this is going to be the question.

description.description: The description of the Social Post. For type QUESTION_AND_ANSWER this is going to be the answer.

url.description: A link for the Social Post. This is mandatory for a "Special Offer" and should point to a page concerning the offer.

type.description: The type of the Social Post. POST, OFFER, QUESTION_AND_ANSWER, EVENT or ALERT.

alertType.description: A special type for Google ALERT posts. Possible values are COVID_19.

status.description: The current status of the Social Post (scheduled, active, inactive, deleted, not_published, published, impossible)

dateStart.description: The starting date of EVENT and OFFER type Social Posts. It is used to indicate when an EVENT/OFFER will start. For API versions older than 20210804, it is used as publicationDate.

dateEnd.description: The ending date of the Social Post (type=OFFER). The post will be removed from the listings at that date. It also determines when a special offer should end.

publicationDate.description: The date on which the Social Post will be published. It is used to schedule posts in the future. Format: YYYY-MM-dd''T''HH:mm:ssXXXXX  (Example: 2007-12-03T10:15:30+01:00)

isStoreLocator.description: When enabled, the SocialPost will be visible in StoreLocator.

timeZone.description: The timezone in which the Social Post should be created

labels.description: The list of location labels as entered when creating/updating the Social Post.

items.description: The list of location labels as entered when creating/updating the Social Post

firstComment.description: The first comment to be posted after a post creation. Only available for INSTAGRAM

businessIds.description: The list of location group IDs as entered when creating/updating the Social Post.

locationIds.description: The list of location group IDs as entered when creating/updating the Social Post.

listingPageIds.description: The list of location group IDs as entered when creating/updating the Social Post.

businessPageIds.description: The list of location group IDs as entered when creating/updating the Social Post.

excludedLocationIds.description: The list of location group IDs as entered when creating/updating the Social Post.

directories.description: The video of the social post (can only be one)

couponCode.description: A couponCode for redeeming a "Special Offer" (SocialPost.type=OFFER). Currently only supported for Google Posts.

termsAndConditions.description: Terms and Conditions for redeeming a "Special Offer" (SocialPost.type=OFFER). Currently only supported for Google Posts.

locationGroupIds.description: The list of location group IDs as entered when creating/updating the Social Post.

videos.description: The video of the social post (can only be one)

SocialPost.description: A Social Post is a message for your customers that will be published on some of your listings. This can be a "News", a "Special Offer" or a "Question and Answer".
